15036:
Just a day, just an ordinary day
Just trying to get by
Just a boy, just an ordinary boy, but
He was looking to the sky and
As he asked, if I would come along
I started to realize
That everyday he finds, just what he's lookin' for
Like a shooting star, he shines
And he said

Take my hand
Live while you can
Don't you see your dreams lie right
In the palm of your hand

And as he spoke, he spoke ordinary words
Although they did not feel, no
For I felt what I had not felt before
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Making my way downtown
Walking fast, faces pass and I'm homebound
Staring blankly ahead
Just making my way
Making a way through the crowd

And I need you
And I miss you
And now I wonder

If I could fall
Into the sky
Do you think time
Would pass me by?
Cause you know I'd walk a thousand miles
If I could just see you
Tonight

It's always times like these
When I think of you

I've been mistaken
You've swindled once again
Now there's no question
I, I was wrong

And now I stand alone
Just studded in your throne
Your true colors shone
You don't belong

And now I'm lost
And now I run from you
And now I see
Just how I bleed from you

But now it's clear
I went along for the ride, ow, a-a-aow

Hey, mister, merry man
I know you'll come again
Till you find just what
You're lookin' for

And if I'm your little lamb
